By using the assignments feature, you can assign work to your students through Kerboodle in order to mark returned work and track student progress.

  1. In the Library, select the resources you would like to include in your assignment by ticking the boxes alongside the resource names.
  2. Click on the Select an Action drop down and choose Assign these resources to your Teaching Groups.
  3. Complete the details in the pop-up screen and click Assign.
